entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -13.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12.
